title: Fluorescence mediated particle analysis of large populations of prokaryotic cells and viruses
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The facility is used by a wide range of groups for basic research. Electronics Policy & public services
findingsText: Grant was awarded to purchase a specialist flow cytometer for the examination of microbial cells and smaller particles such as viruses. The equipment was purchased as proposed and forms part of a multi-user, multi-instrument facility. (See http://www.york.ac.uk/biology/technology-facility/imaging-cytometry/ic-equipment/ic-flow-cytometry/) Cell cycle characteristics of Methanothermobacter thermautotrophicus have been published and provide insight into the proliferation of methanogenic archaea. Environment
